articles.author: Analysis by Lauren Dezenski, CNN
articles.title: Biden tees up a hopeful Independence Day
articles.description: As the pandemic's one-year mark came and went, President Joe Biden dangled a major piece of hope in front of the American people: a taste of (nearly) normal on July Fourth, if only we stay the course.

articles.title: Biden administration grants humanitarian protection for Burmese in US
articles.description: The Biden administration on Friday granted humanitarian protection to Burmese nationals and residents in the United States due to the military coup and violence against civilians in Myanmar.

articles.title: Why George Floyd's memorial site is surrounded by barricades
articles.description: Since May 2020, the site of George Floyd's death in Minneapolis has served as a memorial and place for prayer, but now it's surrounded by barricades and increasing violence. CNN's Sara Sidner has more.
